reviews.review: 점점 더 재미있어짐ㅠㅠ트롤러 몇 짜증나는거 제외하구..

I'll say that this is an amazing game but this is how I think the new players will react on this game. There's group A. These are the people that love this game soooo much even though this game has not been fair to the them (hard to learn, difficult to master and getting used to the game) but still played it regardless and kept playing it, spending hundreds of hours on it, And ultimately becoming great and loving the heck out of this game. And there's group B... These are the people that tried out the game, was too hard for them and gave up with only a couple of hours of gameplay. I think this game is divisive to players overall but if this game stick with you, it reaaally stick with you. The game still feels unbalanced and unfair and frankly, I don't think it will ever be "fair". But regardless, I love this game sooo much. So many great original and licensed characters, fun gameplay, it's overall great. I recommend it but I feel like you will guarantee either gonna fall in group A or B.

嘿嘿

与许多恐怖游戏都是线性单机玩法不同，《黎明杀机》是一款竞技类游戏。它由两大阵营组成——四位逃生者与一位屠夫。屠夫拥有压倒性的力量优势，可以攻击逃生者并将他们处决，而逃生者只能通过修复发电机恢复电力才能逃出生天。尽管屠夫拥有绝对的力量优势，但好在处决过程相对繁琐，且逃生者有人数优势，并且可以更加灵活地利用地形优势进行风筝。
     “恐怖”的感觉通常只持续在入门阶段的几十个小时里。当玩家适应操作并背熟地图后，每一场游戏就成了“倒霉的农场主和狡猾的偷电贼”的狗血故事。让这场原本的血腥屠杀变成了有些欢乐的捉迷藏。
      接下来说说游戏匹配机制的问题, 这里有一个定律: 单排人类＜屠夫＜车队
       作为新手屠夫你有很大几率匹配到高配车队，你可能会被气到血压飙升。作为老手屠夫你也可以遇到新手人类，单方面碾压。人类方面也是同理。我也是在这样的环境入坑，我主玩屠夫，中间也放弃过，因为只要晚上7点之后我玩基本上全tm是高配人类，搞得我真的很难受。
      这同样引出了这个游戏最大的问题，匹配机制不平衡！在不对等的匹配环境对萌新的劝退力度太大了，能坚持下来的人太少了。
      但是无论如何我还是坚持到了现在。。。。尽管我对这个游戏又爱又恨但是我还是决定送上我的好评。我从19年入坑这个游戏，中间丢了一次账号，去年又重新注册了现在这个账号。
       因为这款游戏，我遇到我曾经最爱的人，她曾经愿意了解我，她陪我玩这款游戏，尽管她真的真的很胆小，每次被屠夫追的失声尖叫。也不是一止搞砸了我的救人计划，也不止一次托了团队的后腿，但是她每次游戏过后笑起来的时候，总是那么美，那么惹人怜爱。她当初告诉我她最喜欢小叮当（幽灵杀手），我就苦练小叮当，把技术练的炉火纯青。我曾经跟她立下过誓言，无论她上钩子多少次，我都会拼尽全力从屠夫手上救下她。当时我想，这是在这款游戏里能立下的最大的誓言了吧。
       可惜在去年的6月份，她成为了别人的女孩，留下我孤独一人在杀机的世界里，在分手不久后，我的账号因为借给别人玩就给搞丢了。。。被盗号了吧可能是。我开了新的游戏账号，重新开始我的杀机之旅，但是有的时候，来到同一个地方，还是会睹物思人。分手了之后游戏账号就寄了，这或许是上天在鼓励我忘记她吧。
       最后@一下官方，生化危机二次联动快点给爷来！威斯克给我搞快点做出来！！！！

I shitted myself

当有一天我的农场不在断电了，没一台发电机都在井然有序发动着，农场大门敞开着。我握着电锯站在麦场中听着乌鸦叫声但少了惨叫声，心里总觉得少了什么原来是少了那四个身影，我想是我太残忍把他们赶走现在有点不舍得他们了。我把他们砸我头的板子扶好了，发电机修好了，大门也打开了。但仍然没看那四个熟悉的身影。
我不知道是他们老了吗无法在奔跑了吗，还是我的时代过去了---【花木农场仍在，但未见场中人】

Game's pretty awful right now. Over 4k hours on console and taking breaks from this game will only make it more unfun assuming you're a killer player. Just play surv, it's easier, often times more fun, and not nearly as stressful as killer.

They really completely ruined this game with this past update. Playing survivor now is awful, and playing killer feels like a cake walk. They really dropped this massive nerf for survivors - killing many of the perks, some needed a rework, some really didn't need to be touched AT ALL.
The survivor win/lose rate is completely ruined. I would probably ball park the current to be about 75-80% win/lose. And I mean that in 80% of the time all 4 survivors die. 
Loops are completely killed. You cant get away with any old techs anymore because the killer will just reach you anyways. Vaulting windows feels like a complete trap so the killer can get a free hit on you because thats what happens 90% of the time no matter how much distance you think you had. Cant window tech it either though if you feel like you didn't have enough distance, because now if you don't have enough distance to vault, you DEFINITELY didn't have enough distance to just keep running.
Killers seem even more promoted to proxy camp and tunnel, especially with nerfing decisive strike so much that is almost better to no perks.
Walls? I feel like they're more of a suggestion currently, as I have repeatedly gotten hit around a corner.
I genuinely feel like what happened was the devs were receiving so many complaints about how unbalanced the killers felt and that survivors were overpowered, so they just nerfed everything survivor 6 feet under as a bit of a fear-driven over compensation in hopes the player count increases. They proceed to have one of the biggest drops in their player base in the history of the game this previous month...
For an "asymmetric" game style, this game has never felt more unbalanced. I can see this being the death of the game unless they actually fix this soon.

Before the newest update I thought some of the killers were buffed, but in some justification since it's 4v1. But this newest update I gotta say is garage. The developers decided not give the survivors any chance in anyway possible and ruined the game completely. Going into any match, its best to know you'll lose with out a single chance and might as well find another game to play.

Until behavior figures out what they want to the game experience to be like, I wouldn't buy. Playing as survivor is boring and overly repetitive with no room for errors or else you lose the game for your whole team. Killers are super easy to be successful with but the queue time is obnoxiously long. Killer's have such an easy time now that the experience feels unsatisfying. Overall, do not waste your time until changes are made. Sucks, this game was a lot of fun before the rework.
